q: the regional assistance mission to solomon islands( ramsi) gave supportive statements in court. former ramsi special coordinators Nick Warner and james batley and former ramsi police commander ben mcdevitt provided mitigating statements supporting Allan Kemakeza . Nick Warner pointed to the irony of being the principal proponent of the ramsi which was bound to eventually expose all wrongdoing . australian John Sullivan , the senior partner of sol law, told the court Allan Kemakeza should be given "prime credit for bringing ramsi into the country at risk to himself" . the resulting peace was the reason sol
